entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 in wind prone areas in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
